title: A Whippoorwill in the Woods - Lines 44-53 function

content.question: Lines 44-53 have all of the following functions EXCEPT to

choices.label: illustrate the influence of childhood experience
link the present to the past
emphasize the chaotic quality of natural events

content.answer: emphasize the chaotic quality of natural events

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
